conversation.content: Boa tarde. Estou a ligar sobre uma conta de serviço pré-pago que precisa de ser transferida, due to the account holder's passing.

Boa tarde, obrigada por ligar. Os meus sentimentos pela perda. Claro que a vou ajudar com a transferência da conta hoje. Posso ter o número da conta ou o nome completo da falecida, para localizar o plano de serviço pré-pago?
A titular da conta era Margaret Louise Harrison. She passed away on November third.

Obrigada por essa informação. Localizei a conta da Senhora Harrison, referência PSA-7734-MLH, showing a Gold Level prepaid service plan purchased in 2019. Posso ter o seu nome e a sua relação com a Senhora Harrison, ou a informação da agência funerária?
Sou Thomas Bradley, from Bradley & Sons Funeral Home. Estamos a tratar dos preparativos para a família.

Obrigada, Senhor Bradley. Tenho aqui a Bradley & Sons como fornecedor autorizado na nossa rede, código FSP-4429-B. Para proceder com a transferência, vou precisar de verificar o seu número de licença de diretor, and obtain the death certificate filing number when it becomes available.
O meu número de licença é FD-88412. A certidão de óbito ainda está a ser processada pelo município.

Perfeito, verifiquei a sua licença FD-88412 no nosso sistema. Por agora, posso iniciar uma transferência provisória com o número de caso TRF-2024-11-9847, which will activate the prepaid benefits immediately. A família tem um saldo de $8,750.00 em serviços cobertos, and you'll receive the full authorization packet within 2 business hours.
Excelente. Pode esclarecer que serviços estão cobertos no plano Gold Level dela?

Com certeza. O plano Gold Level PSA-7734-MLH cobre o pacote completo de serviços, including embalming, viewing arrangements, ceremony coordination, seleção de urna premium das categorias A até C, e transporte num raio de 50 milhas. Adicionalmente, há uma verba de $1,500.00 para arranjos florais e impressão memorial, under code FLR-GOLD-150.
Obrigado. A família pediu serviços de limusine adicionais. Como é que devemos tratar isso?

Compreendo. Serviços de limusine adicionais além do transporte incluído podem ser acrescentados à nossa tarifa contratada de $275.00 por veículo, for up to 4 hours, código de faturação LIMO-ADD-275. Quer que eu adicione isso à autorização de serviço agora, ou vai tratar disso separadamente com a família?
Por favor, adicione uma limusine adicional à autorização. The family will cover the difference.

Já adicionei. O seu número de autorização atualizado é TRF-2024-11-9847-L1, agora mostrando o serviço de limusine adicional a $275.00. A família será responsável por este valor, beyond the prepaid coverage.
Perfeito. Quando é que os fundos serão libertados para a nossa agência?

O pagamento inicial de 60% será transferido eletronicamente para a vossa conta terminada em 4492, within 24 hours of receiving the provisional transfer. Os restantes 40% são libertados após submissão da documentação completa do serviço e certidão de óbito, through our portal at providers.memorialservices.com/submit.
Entendo. Devo usar as nossas credenciais de login habituais para a submissão no portal?

Sim, as vossas credenciais existentes para Bradley & Sons vão funcionar. O vosso username da agência é BRADLEY-4429, and you'll upload everything under case number TRF-2024-11-9847-L1. Há mais alguma coisa sobre a conta da Senhora Harrison em que precise de ajuda hoje?
Não, isso cobre tudo. Thank you for your help with this transfer.

De nada, Senhor Bradley. Enviei um email de confirmação com todos os detalhes da transferência e códigos de autorização, to your registered email. Se precisar de assistência adicional, por favor referencie o número de caso TRF-2024-11-9847-L1. Obrigada por ligar, and please extend our condolences to the Harrison family.

original_conversation.content: Good afternoon. I'm calling regarding a prepaid service account that needs to be transferred due to the account holder's passing.

Good afternoon, and thank you for calling. I'm very sorry for the loss. I'll certainly help you with the account transfer today. May I please have the account number or the deceased's full name to locate the prepaid service plan?
The account holder was Margaret Louise Harrison. She passed away on November third.

Thank you for that information. I've located Mrs. Harrison's account, reference number PSA-7734-MLH, showing a Gold Level prepaid service plan purchased in 2019. May I please have your name and your relationship to Mrs. Harrison or your funeral home information?
I'm Thomas Bradley from Bradley & Sons Funeral Home. We're handling the arrangements for the family.

Thank you, Mr. Bradley. I show Bradley & Sons as an authorized provider in our network, facility code FSP-4429-B. To proceed with the transfer, I'll need to verify your director license number and obtain the death certificate filing number when it becomes available.
My license number is FD-88412. The death certificate is still being processed by the county.

Perfect, I've verified your license FD-88412 in our system. For now, I can initiate a provisional transfer with case number TRF-2024-11-9847, which will activate the prepaid benefits immediately. The family has a balance of $8,750.00 in covered services, and you'll receive the full authorization packet within two business hours.
Excellent. Can you clarify what services are covered under her Gold Level plan?

Certainly. The Gold Level plan PSA-7734-MLH covers the complete service package including embalming, viewing arrangements, ceremony coordination, premium casket selection from category A through C, and transportation within a 50-mile radius. Additionally, there's a $1,500.00 allowance for floral arrangements and memorial printing under code FLR-GOLD-150.
Thank you. The family has requested additional limousine services. How should we handle that?

I understand. Additional limousine services beyond the included transportation can be added at our contracted rate of $275.00 per vehicle for up to four hours, billing code LIMO-ADD-275. Would you like me to add that to the service authorization now, or will you be handling that separately with the family?
Please add one additional limousine to the authorization. The family will cover the difference.

I've added that. Your updated authorization number is TRF-2024-11-9847-L1, now showing the additional limousine service at $275.00. The family will be responsible for this amount beyond the prepaid coverage.
Perfect. When will the funds be released to our facility?

The initial payment of 60% will be electronically transferred to your account ending in 4492 within 24 hours of receiving the provisional transfer. The remaining 40% releases upon submission of the completed service documentation and death certificate through our portal at providers.memorialservices.com/submit.
I understand. Should I use our standard login credentials for the portal submission?

Yes, your existing credentials for Bradley & Sons will work. Your facility username is BRADLEY-4429, and you'll upload everything under case number TRF-2024-11-9847-L1. Is there anything else regarding Mrs. Harrison's account that you need assistance with today?
No, that covers everything. Thank you for your help with this transfer.

You're very welcome, Mr. Bradley. I've sent a confirmation email with all the transfer details and authorization codes to your registered email. If you need any additional assistance, please reference case number TRF-2024-11-9847-L1. Thank you for calling, and please extend our condolences to the Harrison family.
